name: GenesisLRT Restaked ETH
description: GenesisLRT supercharges your ETH by enabling you to stake your ETH on not just one, but multiple networks at once, thereby maximizing your rewards. It applies EigenLayer to empower you to restake your assets. It earns you extra profits, bolsters the security of the network, and allows you to unlock the restaked liquidity with the liquid restaked token genETH. Genesis offers users the possibility to have a customizable restaking experience by being able to choose their operators, validators, and AVSs (Actively Validated Service) for the best experience and yields available in the market.
